page.title: 15FIRE AT A HOTEL
page.content: {A DRAMATIC EVENT} Earlier this year, the Boston Hotel caught fire during the night. No-one knows how the fire started;the possibilities are that a television was left on or an electric fire was left too near some furniture. Luckily, no-one was hurt, but there was a lot of damage and the ground floor was completely burnt out. The promenade was completely blocked for several days and caused traffic problems. One of our teachers was quite late for school because her driveway was blocked by fire engines! Work began immediately on repairing the hotel, and fortunately it should be ready to be re-opened in late November, 1985. It has been transformed to a very new, modern hotel after months of hard work.
